channel.title: Reading on Harshad Saykhedkar
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on Harshad Saykhedkar

item.title: Cheklist Manifesto & Thinking Fast and Slow
item.description: I read ‘the checklist manifesto’ by Atul Gawande. I am a firm believer in books and advice in general from anyone in practice oriented profession: doctors, investors (not speculators), pilots and so on. The professinals in these fields have generally a large skin in the game (money, reputation, their own life), making their advice worthy as compared to academic advise. The checklist book was then just the right fit for a lazy afternoon reading at once.
